Package game

Class ZombieLeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.ZombieLeg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, Weapon, ItemInterface
    public class ZombieLeg
extends WeaponItem
    A subclass of WeaponItem that represents ZombieLeg Leg will be dropped by zombie and picked up by Zombie or Player. It has damage of 25 and verb of "hits". Dropped leg can be crafted into Zombie Mace by Player after Player picks up.
    Author:
    SookMun
